pageTitle: Public events for December 15, 2015 | Prime Minister of Canada
articleHtml:
Public events for the Prime Minister, Justin Trudeau, for Tuesday, December 15, 2015:

Ottawa

9:30 a.m. – The Prime Minister holds a Cabinet meeting. A media availability with Ministers will follow in the Foyer of the House of Commons.

Foyer of the House of Commons
Centre Block
Parliament Hill
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 11:45 a.m.
  • Media should contact the Parliamentary Press Gallery for accreditation.

Ottawa

12:30 p.m. – The Prime Minister attends the presentation of the Final Report of the Truth and Reconciliation Commission of Canada. The Prime Minister delivers a brief statement on behalf of the Government of Canada.

Shaw Centre, Gatineau Room
55 Colonel By Drive
Ottawa, Ontario

Notes for media:

  • Media should arrive no later than 12:00 p.m.
  • Media registration and accreditation will open at the Shaw Centre at 11:00 a.m.

PMO Media Relations: 613-957-5555
